text: Helianthemum guerrae is a species of plant in the family Cistaceae. It is endemic to Spain. Its natural habitat is Mediterranean Matorral shrubland vegetation. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== guerrae Category:Endemic flora of Spain Category:Matorral shrubland Category:Endangered plants Category:Endangered biota of Europe Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Helianthemum guerrae
